column2: Cleanspark, Inc. offers advanced energy software and control technology that enables a plug-and-play enterprise solution to modern energy challenges. The company is headquartered in Bountiful, Utah and currently employs 5 full-time employees. The firm is a provider of microgrid solutions to military, commercial and residential properties. Its services include intelligent solar monitoring solutions, microgid design and engineering, project development consulting services, system installation and consulting, and turnkey microgrid implementation services. Its Flex Power System (System), which uses the mPulse Energy Operating Platform software, provides sustainable energy for its energy customers. The firm is also working on MicroGrid Development Projects. The Project includes integration of its software and control platform with various energy storage technologies. The company also has a Gasifier business. Its technology converts any organic material into SynGas, which is a clean burning fuel suitable for use in dual-fuel diesel engines, gas turbines and steam boilers.
